features: Contains (3) 12 Ounce Bottles of EO French Lavender Liquid Hand Soap
Relaxing, soothing, lavender pure essential oil. Just thinking about this calming scent can make you pause, take a deep breath, and exhale
This hand soap contains nutrient-rich botanical extracts and mild cleansers. Breathe in the soothing scent of lavender pure essential oil every time you wash your hands. Hello, aromatherapy
EO Liquid Hand Soaps are made with organic ingredients and are triclosan free, synthetic fragrance free, cruelty free, paraben free, sulfate free, and are Certified Gluten Free
EO helps you create meditative moments of self-care through aromatherapy with safe, natural, organic, and sustainably-farmed ingredients
body.description: Your hands deserve some gratitude and TLC. Treat them to EO Liquid Hand Soap, a mild plant-based cleanser that moisturizes and is gentle enough for everyday use. This Liquid Hand Soap is made with mild amino acid cleansers and our organic herbal blend of aloe vera, calendula, chamomile, and white tea extracts. We also add Vitamin E to nourish and fortify skin. Never any parabens, artificial colors or dyes, or synthetic fragrances. We blend lavender, part floral, part herbaceous, with just a hint of grassiness, into many of our products to add a touch of peace and balance and providing moments of self care and relaxation through aromatherapy. At EO Products, we believe the best resources come from nature. That is why we are committed to our zero-waste mission. Our products are always made with reduction and repurposing in mind, this includes our recyclable packaging. Since 1995, we've made our products from domestic and imported ingredients in our family-owned and -operated factory in San Rafael, California. We learned early on that the only way to meet our own high standards was to take responsibility for everything ourselves. From our family to yours, enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean light scent
reviews.reviewText: Nice, clean scent, not overpowering. Only need a small amount as it lathers up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure, Amazing Scent - Thick Soap
reviews.reviewText: This hand soap has quickly become a favorite. The scent is fresh, just the right of orange blossom-y and light and doesn't smell cheap or chemically. I love that the viscosity is thick so it feels like a good quality soap. I even add some water if putting into a decorative dispenser to thin just a bit and it goes farther without feeling watery. I plan to keep this on my subscription list for my go-to hand soap. It's also good to use it to bathe my dog since I know it's a pure product and her skin doesn't get irritated or dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars favorite hand soap of all time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hand soap
reviews.reviewText: Soap itself smells wonderful, seems as good as a more expensive brand. Only negative is the pump doesn’t work. Twisted it at least 20 times and still not working. Be ready to pour contents into another container.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells Really Nice!
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell. This is very nice hand soap. However, it says it is a foam. Mine looks like a gel upon dispensing into hand, and doesn't really seem to foam up?Or am I just having yet another senior moment? I do have poor vision, but this doesn't seem foamy to me.I would still highly recommend the product, I normally would not pay this much for hand soaps , but they do also offer2--32 oz. Refill bottles for a very good price. Here on amazon, so you can refill your bottles and continue using the lovely lavender soap. I am also impressed with the natural oils that they put in here, that stuff is really good for my skin.Update a day later to my review. The company says they have not made a foam in years, yet the description says foam. It would appear that they did not know this, (I know, I was surprised as well),so they are looking into this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a relaxing lavender smell. I absolutely love it. It's essential oil , not perfume, so perfect for my family as perfume gives us headaches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent all around
reviews.reviewText: This has been one of my favorite hand soaps for a long time. I love the aesthetics of the bottle design, the lather is just enough, but the best part is the scent. So many lavender products are dolled up and end up smelling too feminine. This one is just a nice pure lavender, strong but not too strong, that works well in a bathroom for any gender. This will probably just stay on rotation at my house. Would have preferred not having to buy a three pack, but all is well. Ended up taking one of the bottles to work. Anyway, if you’re a lavender fan, definitely recommend this.
